title: Umm can i not play anymore?
body: So i was in a match before the D/C and my team won and when i click accept to leave the match my game insta closed out and now that its back online it is making me "reconnect" but when i click reconnect it should bring up " you're trying to reconnect to a game that is already finished" bring up the scoreboard then i go on my way but nope it is trying to load the game and well the game isn't there so it keeps crashing.  Ummm wtf....

replies.body: Bunch of us having the same issue
